PackageOracle.name: DA_TIME_ZONE
PackageOracle.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE CHTR.DA_TIME_ZONE
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.40.22.977453000 PM -06:00 */
AS

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,time_zone_cd IN VARCHAR2
,time_zone_nm IN VARCHAR2
,utc_offset_txt IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,time_zone_cd IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

END da_time_zone;

body.name: DA_TIME_ZONE
body.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY CHTR.DA_TIME_ZONE
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.40.22.987336000 PM -06:00 */
AS

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,time_zone_cd IN VARCHAR2
,time_zone_nm IN VARCHAR2
,utc_offset_txt IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_time_zone.add, parms=' || time_zone_cd || '|' || time_zone_nm || '|' || utc_offset_txt || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_time_zone a
(
a.time_zone_cd
,a.time_zone_nm
,a.utc_offset_txt
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
add.time_zone_cd
,add.time_zone_nm
,add.utc_offset_txt
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_time_zone.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,time_zone_cd IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_time_zone.del, parms=' || time_zone_cd || '|' || audit_user || '|');
UPDATE chtr.t_time_zone a
SET a.record_stat = 'D'
,a.modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP
,a.modified_by = del.audit_user
WHERE a.time_zone_cd = del.time_zone_cd
;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_time_zone.del');

END del;

END da_time_zone;
